attributes.action: Save Southwick Community Centre - for use of sports.
attributes.additional_details:
Southwick Community centre has been left vacant for many years, N.E Sports would like to hire the building to provide indoor sports training and football training to local communities to help keep the children/teenagers off the streets. Instead the council would like to auction it off to put more money in their pockets, yet N.E Sports are willing to pay rent and use the facilities (for which up to now has lay vacant) for the benefit of surrounding areas and benefit of young people..
Please join in with us in letting the council know that people would like this building to be used for the benefit of younger people and teenagers, to keep them safe and off the streets, to teach them new skills as well as life skills...please help if you think this is important... many thanks
